bets.reasoning: Phoenix's 17-6 home record against Clippers' dismal 9-16 road record creates a significant venue edge. The 6-1 recent H2H record and +3.5 net rating differential provide strong statistical backing. While Clippers are 8-2 L10, their road struggles and missing ~24% of offense with Jones Jr./Bogdanovic limited tips the balance clearly to Phoenix at home.
bets.primary_edge: Phoenix 17-6 home vs Clippers 9-16 road combined with 6-1 recent H2H dominance
bets.reflection: The 24-point blowout wasn't variance - we overweighted historical H2H and home/road splits while underweighting the Clippers' surging form. A team going 8-2 in their last 10 with clear momentum deserved more respect than season-long road struggles.

bets.reasoning: Cleveland's nearly 5-point net rating advantage (+2.19 vs -2.58) is substantial. Portland's 4-game losing streak and 0-2 home record vs Cleveland in H2H history provide additional confidence. Cleveland's 4th quarter strength (+2.8 avg in H2H) suggests they close games well. Garland concerns are noted but Mitchell's 28.2 PPG provides reliable scoring.
bets.primary_edge: ~5 point net rating differential with Cleveland 7-3 L10 vs Portland on 4-game skid
bets.reflection: The primary edge was spot-on - Cleveland's superior net rating and Portland's losing streak played out exactly as expected, with the 19-point margin exceeding even our projections. Process was sound; the medium confidence was perhaps too conservative given the clear statistical separation.

bets.matchup: Los Angeles Lakers @ New York Knicks
bets.reasoning: Knicks' 19-6 home record and +6.3 net rating differential are compelling, but Lakers' 3-1 H2H record (2-0 at MSG) creates real concern. The deciding factor is Lakers' significant availability issues - LeBron (57% games), Reaves (51%), Vincent (58%) representing 29% offensive impact. Knicks' 5-game win streak with dominant margins (+26 avg) shows current form. Lower confidence due to H2H pattern.
bets.primary_edge: Knicks elite 19-6 home record + Lakers major availability concerns offset concerning H2H history
bets.final_score: Los Angeles Lakers 100 @ New York Knicks 112
bets.reflection: The primary edge held - Knicks' home dominance and Lakers' availability issues proved decisive despite concerning H2H history. The 12-point margin validated our read on the situational factors, and appropriately sizing down due to H2H uncertainty was the right call.
